content: 1. Open the menu > New Account > Email
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Is the outgoing server set to smtp.office365.com once it is all you need to do is restart Thunderbird to see the authentication method you need.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Then you will need to export them (Right click the address book in the list), I suggest as an LDIF file and attach that to an email.
creator: MattAuSupport
